channel.title: Taxi on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Taxi on Game6r

item.title: Simulator Taxi Driver 2019
item.description: While playing Sim Taxi 3D, you get a job as a taxi driver and go to a huge Sim city in your yellow car. Try to earn as much money as possible by transporting customers that you can find on the local streets. Carefully follow the indicators of the navigator located at the bottom of the screen. He will point you to new customers and the most optimal routes. To play Sim Taxi 3d you need to be careful not to get into an accident, because then you will have to return to the garage, spend money on repairing your car and refuse customers.

item.title: Superhero Taxi
item.description: Taxi 4 game invites you to take part in a competition organized by one of the largest taxi companies in New York. In order to obtain a taxi driver’s license, you must complete the tasks that a demanding instructor offers you. Show off your driving skills and get a work permit.
